text: oh iwe Mtumwi! Asakudandaulitse anthu amene amafulumira kusakhulupirira ndipo amati: “Tikhulupirira” ndi milomo yawo pamene mitima yawo ilibe chikhulupiriro. Ndipo pakati pa Ayuda pali anthu amene amamvetsera mabodza ndi zimene anthu ena amene sadadze kwa iwe amakamba. Iwo amasintha mawu monga momwe adalili ndipo amati: “Ngati mwapatsidwa izi landirani ndipo ngati simudapatsidwe chenjerani.” Ndipo amene Mulungu afuna kumusocheretsa,iwe ulibe mphamvu ina iliyonse pa iye yopikisana ndi Mulungu. Awo ndi amene mitima yawo Mulungu safuna kuiyeretsa ndipo kwa awa kuli zinthu zochititsa manyazi m’dziko lino ndi chilango chachikulu m’dziko limene lili nkudza
